summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account activity for the period from May 1, 2016, to May 31, 2016. It includes information on account balances, transactions, and instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.

keyFacts: The document details a business checking account with a beginning balance of $139,471.98 as of May 1, 2016.
There were no service charges or overdraft fees during the statement period.
The document provides instructions for reporting errors or inquiries related to the account.
The account is held at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
The statement covers the period from May 1, 2016, to May 31, 2016.
